name: MUGEN DEMON SLAYER
description:
This game is mugen, its contains demon slayer character like tanjiro,nezuko,zenitsu,inosuke and more...

Game key:W,A,D,S to punch,slash,ultimate.ARROW KEY to move

(If you feel the control is suck you can change it in option)

SHIFT=Enter or use A

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS:7,8,10,11
    • Storage: 1GB available space
    • 1.5gb ram
